overview:
David co-founded Media6Degrees , where he helped build a technology that provides major brand marketers with targeted audiences using the power of social graph data.

Prior to Media6Degrees David was Vice President, Media, at Didit Search Marketing where he created SearchConnectâ„¢, the first integrated media platform that combined Search Data & Display advertising with Re-Targeting. Under his direction, SearchConnect won the ClickZ Marketing Echo Excellence Award in 2007 for Best Behavioral Targeting Personalization technology.

David began his internet online career at online ad giant DoubleClick which has since merged with Google, where he spent four years in various sales management roles.

David draws his strength from his wife and twin girls, and enjoys an occasional golf game, although not very good at the game. He currently resides in New York City, and obtained B.S. in Business/Marketing from The Ohio State University.
